v.v: Yahweh, the man you made king is glad because you have caused him to be strong.
You have given him everything he most desired,
You have done so many wonderful things for him.
He asked you to let him live for a long time,
His power as king is very great because you have allowed him to win victories over his enemies.
You will enable him to kill all his enemies,
When you appear, you will throw them into a fiery furnace.
You will remove their children from this earth;
You will cause them to run away
Yahweh, show us that you are very strong!

v: He rejoices because you have enabled him to defeat his enemies.
and you have not refused to do what he requested you to do.
You placed a gold crown on his head.
and you have enabled him to live for a long time.
and you have caused him to be joyful in your presence.
and the king trusts in you.
disastrous things will never happen to him.
Because you are angry with them, you will swallow them up;
the fire will burn them up.
but what they plan will never succeed.
When you do that, we will sing and praise you because you are very powerful.
